com.martinleopold.mode.debug
Class LineID

java.lang.Object
  com.martinleopold.mode.debug.LineID

public class LineID
extends java.lang.Object

Describes an ID for a code line. Comprised of a file name and a (0-based) line number.

Author:
Martin Leopold

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
Test whether this LineID is equal to another object. Two LineID's are equal when both their fileName and lineNo are equal.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Output a string representation in the form fileName:lineNo+1. Note this uses a 1-based line number as is customary for human-readable line numbers.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
the string representation of this line ID
